mapper.insert: insert into EMP values( #{ empId }, #{ empPwd }, #{ empName }, #{ empAddr1 }, #{ empAddr2 }, #{ empAddr3 }, #{ empPhone }, default, #{ empStatus } )
mapper.select: select * from emp where emp_id = #{ empId }
select emp_id AS empId, emp_name AS empName, address AS empAddress, phone AS empPhone, enroll_date AS empEnrollDate, status AS empStatus from emp order by enroll_date
